name: Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum
description: The world's most iconic fragrance with aldehydes, ylang-ylang, and sandalwood. Timeless and sophisticated.
care_instructions: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
story: Created in 1921 by Ernest Beaux, Chanel No. 5 revolutionized the perfume industry.
meta_title: Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum - Iconic Luxury Fragrance
meta_description: The legendary Chanel No. 5 eau de parfum in classic 100ml bottle

name: Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette
description: Fresh and raw fragrance with bergamot, pepper, and ambroxan. Modern masculinity in a bottle.
care_instructions: Keep away from heat and light. Store upright.
story: Sauvage embodies the spirit of wide-open spaces and blue skies.
meta_title: Dior Sauvage Eau de Toilette - Men's Luxury Fragrance
meta_description: Popular Dior Sauvage eau de toilette with fresh bergamot and pepper notes

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: Luxurious and sensual fragrance with black orchid, dark chocolate, and patchouli. Unisex appeal.
care_instructions: Store in original box. Avoid temperature fluctuations.
story: Black Orchid redefined luxury fragrance with its bold and mysterious character.
meta_title: Tom Ford Black Orchid - Luxury Unisex Fragrance
meta_description: Sophisticated Tom Ford Black Orchid with dark orchid and chocolate notes

name: Hermès Terre d'Hermès
description: Woody and mineral fragrance with orange, flint, and cedar. Connects man to his origins.
care_instructions: Protect from direct sunlight. Store at room temperature.
story: Terre d'Hermès tells the story of man's relationship with the earth.
meta_title: Hermès Terre d'Hermès - Woody Luxury Fragrance
meta_description: Classic Hermès Terre d'Hermès with woody orange and mineral notes

name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540
description: Luminous and sophisticated fragrance with saffron, ambergris, and cedar. Modern luxury perfumery.
care_instructions: Handle crystal bottle with care. Store in protective box.
story: Baccarat Rouge 540 represents the pinnacle of contemporary French perfumery.
meta_title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540 - Luxury Fragrance
meta_description: Exquisite MFK Baccarat Rouge 540 with saffron and ambergris in crystal bottle
